title: Triveria Natural Person Verifiable ID
description: Schema of a Triveria Verifiable ID for a natural person

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional properties on credentialSubject to describe IDs that are issued to an individuals associated with a Company.

id.description: Defines a unique identifier of the credential subject

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier for the person

familyName.description: Defines current family name(s) of the credential subject

firstName.description: Defines current first name(s) of the credential subject

currentAddress.description: Defines the current address of the credential subject

company.description: Defines the company of the credential subject

companyRole.description: Defines the company role of the credential subject

email.description: Defines the email of the credential owner

photo.description: Defines the photo/picture of the credential owner

schemeID.description: Defines the schema used to define alternative identification
